page.title: 04INTERVIEW WITH A FISHERMAN
page.content: 1.How long have you been fishing in these parts? Well I've been in the business all my life. 2.Are there as many mackeral in these parts as when you started? Nowhere near. There was a time when you could catch a box of mackerel on each catch. That was about 20 years ago. They are much rarer now. 3.How much did this boat cost? It was built in 1928 and rebuilt in 1962 so its been going for a long time. 4.What was your biggest catch? This was once used to catch herring and you could catch 30,000 at a time. 5.Why is this area called Mackerel Cove? It is called Mackerel Cove because it is the only cove where you could be sure of catching mackerel.
